text: the important fact is that, to a bystander, those two panels he articulated are the most incomprehensible.

text: Yes, I was thinking about how strange they must sound out of context.

name: mattylite
text: Whoa, didn't catch that.  Thank yous and chubbies to this thread.

name: lateadopter
text: It is a thing of rich people to avoid prison time, but Ray definitely wants Paris Hilton's people if it comes to that.  She just got her jail sentence cut in half for good behavior, with "good behavior" defined as being in court to be sentenced to jail.

name: soticoto
text:
Why would Ray need her people?
He has contacts in the force. Contacts who can erase all trouble for letting a known sex-offender mutilate himself in front of minors.

name: molotovcockatoo
text: A comment left by molotovcockatoo was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by CapnMurphy, Deusoma, dropkickpikachu)

name: dropkickpikachu
text: You should look three panels before that one.

name: derelictman
text:
Imagine listening in from the next room.

"This month's Playboy Advisor says that the parietel lobe is the part of the brain that controls hand-eye coordination...Lyle could catch it with a lacrosse stick or butterfly net."

I don't know about you, but I get the image of Lyle waiting with a net to catch a gooey little fragment of brain, which Ray expects to be flying through the air for some reason.

name: rogergs
text: Ray is basically a dude who likes his neuroanatomy sandwiched between quadraphonic stereo placement advice and cliche-free variants on the caipirinha or mojito.

name: zedpower
text: The only way you can get Lyle to hold a butterfly net is to convince him it's for catching wallets with.

name: hypoluxa
text: "Cocksucking dumbo" is just a really great term.

name: rowboat
text:
3-25-11
NEVER FORGET

name: mattylite
text: God damn, I looked that up and now this strip has a chilling pall cast over it.  I guess what I'm trying to say is thank you.

name: stuart
text: I was so confused, becuase the hundredth anniversary is coming up. I was like, "Never forget three months from now? Okay, future-boy"

name: rowboat
text: Looking at it just now for the first time in two years (probably closer to three), I was also a little dumbstruck for a second. I can't believe that even four people got that.

name: stella
text: it's always between neuroscience and drug dealing, isn't it?

name: direhaggis
text:
Ray and Lyle could actually pull this off and not worry about jail time--if it were just them and the victim.

If Ray had a Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation device hooked up to an electrode-propelling taser, with the proper aim, he could short-circuit the right parietal lobe and nearby primary motor cortex temporarily. With a wide enough radius, that could impart 'visual neglect' in the contralateral visual hemisphere, causing the person to completely ignore their left side.

So if Ray were standing to the left of this person, and could get the victim to take out their wallet, he could shoot the device, cause the brain to throw the wallet, have Lyle waiting on the left side to grab the wallet, and the both of them could jet without the person being able to even see them. Roast Beef could even rig the software.

name: mattylite
text: Does this have anything to do with that "brown note" phenomenon I've been hearing so much about?

name: i_love_kate
text: Is he thinking hard in panel 8 or reading from a Playboy that he has strategically placed on the floor?

name: red-barchetta
text: This strip is genius! If I could rate it a 6 I would. The last panel could stand on it's own merits.
